Title: Producing items...
Desc: The output of an item is affected by productivity, bonus, and other elements. If you find it hard to remember... check which item has the highest rating!

Title: Working on main city construction...
Desc: Level up your Main City as fast as possible. You won't regret it.

Title: Selling items...
Desc: Selling things is the main method to earn Golden Shells. Remember to do so when you need them.

Title: Selling at a discount...
Desc: The price of an item will fluctuate within a certain range. Sell high for more profit.

Title: Establishing relations...
Desc: Main city island earnings are limited. The better strategy is to buy new islands as soon as possible.

Title: 正在出海探索…
Desc: Certain islands contain cities. Cities provide a large amount of stable bonuses, and should be purchased first.

Title: Building facilities...
Desc: You may come across buildings with various functions during exploration. Start building as soon as possible.

Title: Developing island...
Desc: You may encounter various events during exploration. Make your choices wisely.

Title: Assessing the profit and loss...
Desc: The city council will issue various commissions. Complete the commissions to upgrade your city bonuses.
